panadura mahesthrath adhikaranaye wibhagawimata niyamitha aparadha saha ratha wahana nadu kihipayak lekhanagarayen athurudanwima gana aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa mangin pawathwu parikshana prathipala rahitha bawa mahesthrath aar. es. ee. disanayaka mahatha hamuwe sanatha wi atha.aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa ema parikshanaya pawathwuye mahesthrathwaraya wisin karana lada paminillak mathaya.panadura polisiye ratha wahana anshaya wisin riyadurakuta pawarana lada naduwak athurudan wi athi bawa mahesthrathwaraya wisin wiwrutha adhikaranaye di soyaganu labiya.ema naduwe withthikarugen naduwata kumak wi dayi mahesthrath waraya wiwrutha adhikaranaye di wimasu wita ohu kiya sitiye lekhanagaraye sewikawakata rupiyal 7500.00ka allasak di adala naduwa athurudan kala bawaya.ohuge prakashayak mahesthrathwaraya wiwrutha adhikaranaye di satahan kara ganimen pasuwa thawath nadu kihipayak athurudan wi athi bawa soya gaththe ya.adala nadu athurudanwima gana parikshana pawathwana lesa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwata saha allas departhamenthuwata da mahesthrathwaraya likhitha paminili idiripath kara adhikarana sewa komishan sabhawata da danwa yawiya.aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa mahesthrath adhikaranaye lekhanagaraye sewikawak athadanguwata gena panadura disa winisuru wasantha jinadasa mahatha wetha idiripath kirimen pasuwa anawaranaya wuye nadu athurudanwima sambandhayen naduwak ayata erehiwa pawarimata pramanawath sakki nomathi bawaya.
me wadakarana minissunta badagini unta kanna hoyaganna widiyak na un duppath.
